$FB  $AAPL  
 
Meta Platforms (FB +0.9%) has shuffled leadership on its advertising teams, part of ongoing efforts to respond to the high-after-effects of privacy changes implemented in Apple's iOS. 
The company is looking to persuade more merchants to set up stores within its Facebook and Instagram apps, The Information reports, and to that end it's changed out the leader of its advertising and business products division. 
 
John Hegeman, recently VP of ads product, has been promoted to lead the wider ads and business products, according to the report. He's a former News Feed head with personal ties to CEO Mark Zuckerberg, and he had been responsible for managing Meta's technical response to Apple's tracking restrictions. 
 
 
Benchmark's launch of coverage of Meta in March paid heed to the outsize effects of iOS changes on Facebook ad returns, noting that some businesses are seeing campaigns in the red for the first time. 
 
https://seekingalpha.com/news/3823085-facebook-parent-meta-platforms-changes-ad-leadership-wrestling-with-apple-changes

body:
Apple ($AAPL) released the latest version of the iPhone SE last month, but the new smartphone is seeing "lackluster demand," according to TF International Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. 
 
Kuo, who has had a reputation for over a decade being an influential Apple watcher, tweeted that the delivery status of the new iPhone SE shows "in stock" on Apple's online stores in a number of countries. This is notable, given that Pegatron is making the iPhone SE and China is experiencing the worst COVID shutdown in recent memory. 
 
 Kuo tweeted that the delivery time for its high-end MacBook Pros, which are being manufactured by Quanta, has increased to 3-5 weeks following the lockdown, indicating "good demand." 
 
On Tuesday, Pegatron said it temporarily turned the lights off at its factories that build iPhones in Shanghai and Kunshan, China, as the Chinese government continues to impose lockdowns in an effort to stem an increase in the region's COVID case numbers. 
 
https://seekingalpha.com/news/3823120-apple-iphone-se-seeing-lackluster-demand-analyst-says

links.title: Apple iPhone SE seeing 'lackluster demand,' analyst says (NASDAQ:AAPL)
links.description: Apple (NASDAQ: AAPL) released the latest version of the iPhone SE last month, but the new smartphone is seeing "lackluster demand," according to TF International Securities analyst Ming-Chi Kuo. Kuo, who has had a reputation for over a decade being an influential Apple watcher, tweeted that the delivery status of the new iPhone SE shows "in stock" on Apple's online stores in a number of countries.

body: Last night I started a new series of charts called "The Big Picture Made Small".  The goal is to filter out the noise and to reduce indigestion.  If you have no idea what I'm talking about just check my profile and scroll down to The Big Picture Made Small post from last night.   I started out with the $WISH ticker.  The chart received a decent number of likes, but it was also met with some harsh criticism.  So, tonight, I'm regrouping and I've decided to pick a ticker that's been traveling NE (North East) for a very long time.   $AAPL began trading in Nov of 1980 and if we take a look at the compass it's been traveling NE for a very long time.  Every second of every day since 1980 squished into one bite sized piece!

$SPY $DIA $AAPL  Caution for the lower highs #TORNADO pattern. also known as distribution..  
after reviewing option orders, This week had Massive PUTs  for #MAY expiration in indexes. each day was a different index.  
 
after today's strong bounce off support, it only got to flat cloud top and 9 day average line  reisistance its been testing/distributing for 2 weeks  every single day.  i mentioned saw this as a caution earlier for bulls as red line was racing down to meet price..   the VIX has tested $25  4 times in past week.. it is highly likley it breaks above 25 which would = breaking under ichimoku cloud on $SPY.   
 
 i see some real cautions. been inbetween ichimoku support and resistance. No room left.. notes on chart. today's rally only got up to resistance its been testing for over 2 weeks.. the ichimoku cloud top equilibrium resistance. bulls must break above cloud..  market on verge of a big move
